name: Land Of Might (ElforTheLandStander)
description:
Land Of Might is a Multiplayer Perma-Death, Bullet Hell, Top-Down, Role Playing Game.

The objective of the game is to defeat powerful bosses and collect cool gear.

- Two Seperate Health Systems

Blood: Basic mortality. The Reaper doesn't allow dead people to walk...

Body: The physical body, hard to move when you dont have a body huh?

- Press Escape any time to be sent back to the starting position.

Website: https://landofmight.alwaysdata.net

Discord: https://discord.gg/tx3hpXAAET
